question: Kento Momota is a famous player of which game?
explanation: Kento Momota has become the most successful badminton player after having a successful 2019 and bagging 11 titles in 12 months’ duration. Kento Momota was banned frombadminton for gambling in 2016. Fast forward to 2019 and the player has enjoyed one of the most successful years in the sport\'s history.
